column2: title=From Abjection to Alchemy: Tolkien's Middle-earth Legendarium

column1: '''''From Abjection to Alchemy: Tolkien's Middle-earth Legendarium''''' is the title of Sara Brown's PhD thesis, presented at the [[Wikipedia:University of Salford

For the work on her thesis, Brown was permitted access to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s private papers held at the [[Bodleian Library]]: "''There she was able to study transcripts of lectures and drafts of some of Tolkien's essays and literary works, including a small note in the author's handwriting ... concerning the character of Gandalf''".<ref>{{webcite
